question:
An IT Engineer needs to create a Virtual Machine in Azure.
Currently, the IT Engineer has an Android OS based workstation.
Which of the following can the IT Engineer use to create the desired Virtual Machine in Azure.
[select 3]

Which of the following customers are eligible to use
Azure Government to develop a cloud solution.
(Select TWO)

A company is planning to set up an Azure Free Account.
Does the Standard Support plan come along with the Azure Free Account?

A company is planning to use its Azure Free Account for hosting production-based resources.
Does the Azure Free Account allow you to host production-based resources?

Your company is planning to use Azure AD for the
authentication of the resources defined in Azure.
Does Azure AD have the capabilities to implement
authorization using Azure RBAC to secure resources?

Does the Azure AD Premium P2 tier guarantee any Azure AD
Services available with the availability higher than 99.99%?

A company plans to upgrade its current Azure AD Free plan to the Azure AD Premium P1 plan.
Does Microsoft provide the same feature set for both plans?

A company wants to try out some services which Azure is offering in Public Preview.
Do the services in Public Preview in Azure come with an SLA?

A company wants to try out some services which Azure is offering in preview.
Does Microsoft provide a separate portal to work with preview features?

Currently, the IT Engineer has a Windows desktop along with the Azure Command Line Interface (CLI).
Which of the following would allow the IT engineer to use the Azure Command Line Interface?

Does the Standard Support plan come along with the Azure Free Account?

A customer is planning to create several Azure Free Accounts.
Can a customer have an allowance of a maximum of 10 Azure Free Accounts?

Your company is planning to host resources in Azure.
Can an administrator give access to partners who do
not have an Azure AD account to access resources in Azure?

A company is planning to purchase Azure AD Premium for its Azure account.
Does the Azure AD Premium tier come with an SLA of 99.99%?

A company wants to try out some services which are being offered by Azure in Public Preview.
Is it a best practice for a company to deploy resources that are
part of Public Preview in their production environment?

A company is planning to use Azure Synapse Analytics for hosting their sales historical data.
Which of the following is a feature of the Azure Synapse SQL architecture?

They would be using the Azure SQL Database service.
Which of the following is the right category
to which the Azure SQL Database service belongs to?

A company is planning to use Azure Storage Accounts.
They have the following requirement.
Storage of 2 TB of data.
Storage of a million files.
Would using Azure Storage fulfil these requirements?

A company is planning to use Azure Storage Accounts.
They have the following requirement.
Storage Account should automatically replicate data to the secondary region.
Can configuring the Read-Access Geo-Redundant Storage Account
automatically replicate data to the secondary region?

Your company is planning to use the Azure App Service (PaaS) to host its set of web applications.
Does Azure provide you full control over the operating system that hosts the web applications?

In case of need as per requirement, does azure help in providing the
ability to scale the platform automatically in hosting the web applications?

As part of the App Service plan, does Microsoft automatically
provide professional services and customizations to applications hosted in Azure Web Apps?

A company is planning to host its resources in Azure.
The senior management wants to know about the capital expenditure (CapEx) and operational expenditure
 (OpEx) that would be incurred when moving to Azure.
Does Azure provide flexibility when it comes to Operational expenditure (OpEx)?

A company is planning to set up a Pay-as-you-go subscription in Azure.
Would they have access to MSDN support forums?

A company wants to migrate its current on-premises servers to Azure.
They want to ensure that the servers are running even if a single Azure Data Center goes down.
Which of the following terms refers to the solution that needs to be in place to fulfill this requirement?
When can an organization decommission its private cloud infrastructure hosted in its data center?

options.A: When they have a hybrid solution
options.B: When all of their servers are in the private cloud
options.C: When all of their servers are in the public cloud
options.D: When all of their servers are in the public or private cloud

question:
company is planning to migrate its public website to Azure.
Which of the following do they need to consider when it comes to hosting their public web site on Azure?

options.A: They would need to reduce the number of connections to the web site.
options.B: They would need to deploy a Virtual Private connection from their on-premises site to Azure.
options.C: They would have to consider paying a monthly cost for the solution
options.D: They would need to pay for the user data transfer onto the site.

question:
